comments.author: Orpichukwu
comments.body: Many were lucky enough to enter even when the price was below $15,000, which they have been holding for a long time and are still not willing to sell. Even now that the price has gotten to this level, everyone has a target. Some people's target is for them to see bitcoin at a particular price before they can move to sell. Some targets are to accumulate a certain number of bitcoins within a certain period of time. We all buy for different purposes. In short, we should not be swayed by the current price of Bitcoin and recommend that our relatives or friends invest in it. Just because the price is high now doesn't mean it will continue to rise in the coming weeks. If the price drops below what they bought it for and they're disappointed, that's not a good outcome. The best strategy is to increase the dollar-cost average (DCA) over time, and they should have started doing that earlier if they could. While we can't predict exactly when Bitcoin's next all-time high will be, it's certain that the price will drop before the next pump.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: If there is one reason why I still invest in Bitcoin, it's because there is still a great possibility that Bitcoin will live as a fruitful means of investment for a very long time. Also, unlike other investments, Bitcoin has two known seasons, which are the bear and the bull seasons. The bear market gives investors the opportunity to acquire Bitcoin at a very low price, while during the bull market, they have the opportunity to sell at a high price and take their profit. Bitcoin is an investment that you don't need to involve any third parties with. I can have as much as 100 bitcoin, and no one will know if I don't tell you.
